Articles.Content:
Project is cancelled.

Edited October 20, 2013 by Kyrian

We have been able to take an image of this new, shiny 'Scythe'. From a safe distance, of course.

The following image was taken by Ronson Kerman. This was taken about seven seconds before the Scythe's missiles malfunctioned and everyone in a two kilometre radius was killed.

The camera used was destroyed, the low-resolution image was uplinked to our communications satellite and it was quickly recovered and analysed by our experts.

The craft is apparently still in heavy development.

Or that's what Ronson heard.
Sorry about the long wait. This thread will be mainly active during 0.22.
